description:
We live in a cool, diverse area of Brooklyn, right across from the 3 train. We get lots of sunlight in our large apartment and beautiful views of Eastern Parkway. We think you'll love staying here!

Message us to book; we usually answer right away!
name: Sunlight + Space on Eastern Parkway
review: Great place and for the price you can't beat it ! It's a very nice part of Brooklyn and Yosef is very accommodating to say the least. Loved the stay and very comfortable
